name: read_data
title: Read Binary Data
description: Reads data from the currently selected data source at the specified address and length. The data is returned as a base64-encoded string. The maximum size that can be read at once is 16MiB, if more data is requested, the call will only return the first 16MiB.

address.description: Address to read from in the selected data source

size.description: Number of bytes to read from the selected data source

handle.description: Handle of the data source the data was read from

data.description: Base64-encoded string of the read data

data_size.description: Number of bytes that were actually read
